pyqgis_plugin.name: SectorPlot
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plots sector areas on risk management map

pyqgis_plugin.name: RegenRadar
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin tests if you have TimeManager plugin installed and active. Then creates a WMS-T layer of current precipitation in The Netherlands, loads this layer into QGIS, and registres it as a TimeLayer in the TimeManager. Then it tries to 'Play' WMS-T from last hour.
